last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: The team discover 'blue material' beneath the cafe, and the use of Ground Penetrating Radar and sniffer dogs reveals two suspicious sites at fields in Gloucestershire.

name: Fred and Rose West: Reopened
overview: Following a team of investigators as they explore new leads suggesting there may be more than Fred and Rose West's victims than their 12 known murders, making the use of Ground Penetrating Radar in new locations.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview:
In the first episode, the team unearths previously unseen documents including the full statement of Fred West's ‘appropriate adult', Janet Leach, that contains details about the location of ‘the farm’, where it has long been suggested up to 20 more victims may be found.

The team studies newly revealed records of discussions between Fred West and his lawyer in which Fred talked about other crimes involving himself, Rose West and his brother, John West.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The team discover 'blue material' beneath the cafe, and the use of Ground Penetrating Radar and sniffer dogs reveals two suspicious sites at fields in Gloucestershire.
